message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I understand you want a larger share, but this is more equitable considering the inflation. Let's close the deal now and both benefit.
Bob, my offer stands. Time is running out and inflation hurts us both. Don't be greedy.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We're losing money with each round!
